MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML11 and ML12 postcode areas of Biggar and Lanark. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:19pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigations and repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:14am on 8th November
